title: SMC_CAMTappet (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_CAMTappet : STRUCT
This
STRUCT
describes the tappets of a cam table as is referenced by
MC_CAM_REF
.

rows.Name: dwDelay
rows.Comment:
In case ofcta=TAPPETACTION.TAPPETACTION_time,
this value determines the delay time in Âµs.

rows.Name: dwDuration
rows.Comment:
In case ofcta=TAPPETACTION.TAPPETACTION_time,
this value determines the time in Âµs, for which the tappet
is switched to on.

rows.Name: iGroupID
rows.Comment: Group or track ID of the tappet output that is switched.

rows.Name: x
rows.Comment: Master position where tappet is switched.
